text: Saúl Lisazo (born June 1, 1956 in Los Toldos, province of Buenos Aires in Argentina) is an Argentine actor and ex-footballer. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Role Notes 2007 Ladrón que roba a ladrón Moctesuma "Mocte" Valdez Lead role 2011 El cártel de los sapos Coronel Ramiro Gutiérrez Television movie 2014 Quiero ser fiel Mr. Gasmer 2014 La dictadura perfecta Javier Pérez Harris === Television === Year Title Role Notes 1990 Amor de nadie Luis Lead role 1992 Tenías que ser tú Alejandro Supporting role 1994 Prisionera de amor José Armando Vidal Protagonist 1994 El día que me quieras Miguel Supporting role 1995 Bajo un mismo rostro Teodorakis Protagonist 1995 Acapulco, cuerpo y alma David Protagonist 1997 La jaula de oro Alex Moncada / Franco Protagonist 1998 Vivo por Elena Alex Moncada / Franco Protagonist 1998 ¿Qué nos pasa? Season 1, episode 33 1999 El niño que vino del mar Don Alfonso Cáceres de Ribera "Duque de Oriol" Protagonist 1999 Por tu amor Marco Durán Protagonist 2001 El derecho de nacer Aldo Drigani Protagonist 2004 Gitanas Juan Domínguez Protagonist 2006 Tierra de pasiones Francisco Contreras Protagonist 2007 Mientras haya vida Héctor Cervantes Protagonist 2008-10 Capadocia Procurador Javier Cordova Season 2, 6 episodes 2010 El Clon Leonardo Ferrer Adult Protagonist 2011 El octavo mandamiento Julián San Millán Adult Protagonist 2012-13 El rostro de la venganza Ezequiel Alvarado Adult Protagonist 2014-15 Las Bravo Enrique Velázquez Protagonist 2015 Señorita Pólvora Octavio Cárdenas Special participation == Other websites == * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Argentine footballers
